thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text: I've been a customer to Willis Orchard for a few years now. Through the years I've ordered many variety of fruit trees, shade trees and bushes. They were great examples and are now producing very well. Through the years I've had tremendous crops-of pears, apples and peaches. The blueberries are tremendous. My fig tree is enormous-and produces many each year. I have one plum tree and it too produces well. I've had some trees (only twice) that did die, but Willis replaced them the next season. Nothing but great things to say.
